testcase.name: guru99 login test scenario and Add Customer
testcase.system-out: Given user is present on login page.........................................passed And title of login page is GTPL Bank Home Page..............................passed When user enters userID and Password from given sheetname "LoginDetails" and rownumber 0.passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then user is on home page...................................................passed Then user clicks on Telecom Project.........................................passed Then user clicks on close button............................................passed Then user clicks on add customer button.....................................passed Then user is on add customer page...........................................passed Then user enters billing address from given sheetname "LoginDetails" and rownumber 0.passed

testcase.name: guru99 login test scenario and Add Tariff Plan
testcase.system-out: Given user is already present on login page.................................passed And title of the login page is GTPL Bank Home Page..........................passed When user enter userID and Password from given sheetname "LoginAddTariffPlanDetails" and rownumber 0.passed And user clicks on the login button.........................................passed Then user navigates to home page............................................passed Then user clicks on Telecom Project field...................................passed Then user clicks on the close button........................................passed Then user clicks on add Tariff Plan.........................................passed Then user is on add tariff plan page........................................passed Then user enters tariff plan details from given sheetname "LoginAddTariffPlanDetails" and rownumber 0.passed
